translation.en: [man on radio] Jurassic One, Jurassic One, come in.
translation.zh: 侏罗纪一号 听到请回答

translation.en: This is Isla Nublar Base, over.
translation.zh: 这里是努布拉岛基地 完毕

translation.en: -[woman on radio] Go, Jurassic One. -[man] Emergency. Hostiles in pursuit.
translation.zh: -侏罗纪一号 请讲-紧急情况 敌方正在追击

translation.en: Two friendlies in need of immediate extraction.
translation.zh: 我方两人需要立即撤离

translation.en: -[woman] Roger that, Base! On our way. -[velociraptors screeching]
translation.zh: 收到 基地 马上出发

translation.en: We can't stop here. Follow me!
translation.zh: 不能在此停留 跟我来

translation.en: [man] Hurry! We're almost to the extraction point!
translation.zh: 快点 马上就到撤离点了

translation.en: [boy] No! We can use the river to mask our scent and--
translation.zh: 不 我们可以用河流掩盖气味…
一点也不酷 布兰德

translation.en: Yeah, like you know what cool is.
translation.zh: 说得好像你知道酷是什么意思似的

translation.en: -[keyboard clacking] -[grunts] Get off me, Brand! -[Brand chuckles] -[grunts]
The dinos get you and that old dude every time.
translation.zh: 恐龙每次都能抓到你和那个老家伙
布兰德 我就差一点了

translation.en: If I can just get around the T. rex, I'd beat the game and win the--
translation.zh: 只要我能躲开霸王龙游戏就能通关 赢得…

translation.en: I-I know. You've said it, like, a thousand times.
translation.zh: 我知道 我听得耳朵都起茧子了

translation.en: But if straight-up gamers say this thing's unwinnable,
translation.zh: 可如果资深玩家们都说这玩意不可能通关

translation.en: how's some dino-nerd kid gonna beat it?
translation.zh: 某个恐龙迷小子要打赢它？

translation.en: Great pep talk, bro. You been working on that?
translation.zh: 好一番打气的话 哥们你一直在练习吧？

translation.en: [sighs] Look, Darius, I know getting to Jurassic World
translation.zh: 听着 达瑞斯 我知道去侏罗纪世界

translation.en: was your and Dad's dream, but there's more to life than just dinosaurs.
translation.zh: 是你和爸爸的梦想 可生活不只有恐龙

translation.en: You never leave your room anymore, bruh.
translation.zh: 你都不出房门一步 小子
爸爸在天之灵也不希望你这样

translation.en: I hear you, but even if winning is dumb and hopeless,
translation.zh: 我知道 可是就算获胜又蠢又无望

translation.en: I still gotta try, you know?
Can you at least, like, take a break? Maybe work in a shower?
translation.zh: 至少你能休息一下吗？或许洗个澡？
你闻起来一股霉味 小子

translation.en: [sighs] All right, look, you do you, D. Just do it quietly.
translation.zh: 好吧 随你做什么 达瑞斯但安静一点

translation.en: I don't want Mom on my case again for you staying up...
translation.zh: 我可不想又被妈妈骂说我不催你睡觉…
发声 结群行为？不是

translation.en: Where are you? Where are you? Where are you?
I'm Mr. DNA, and you're the first person to ever beat our game,
translation.zh: 我是DNA先生 你是第一个通关的人

translation.en: so we wanna reward you with a trip
to Jurassic World's brand-new, state-of-the-art adventure camp.
translation.zh: 前往侏罗纪世界参加全新且顶尖的冒险营

translation.en: That's right, get ready to join us at Camp Cretaceous!
translation.zh: 没错 做好准备 和我们一起加入白垩冒险营吧
各位营员 欢迎来到努布拉岛

translation.en: You are the chosen few, the first kids in the entire world
translation.zh: 你们是从全球挑选出来的为数不多的第一批孩子
能够体验不可思议的感觉

translation.en: I know, the trip from the mainland was rough on some.
translation.zh: 我明白 对某人而言从大陆来到岛屿不容易

translation.en: You heard that correctly-- head honcho, big shot.
translation.zh: 你们没听错 也就是头头 大人物
真不好意思 我迟到了

translation.en: I'm Roxie, head counselor of Camp Cretaceous.
translation.zh: 我叫萝西是白垩冒险营的首席辅导员

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, it's sort of a co-head counselor sort of situation.
Anyway, some of you won contests to be here,
translation.zh: 总之有人是赢得比赛来到这里的

translation.en: some of you had VIP invites, but for the next two weeks,
translation.zh: 有人是接到了贵宾的邀请不过在接下来两周内

translation.en: all of you will be getting the five-star treatment!
translation.zh: 你们都将得到五星级的待遇

translation.en: As our first campers, we've lined up
exclusive behind-the-scenes tours of Jurassic World.
translation.zh: 我们安排了独一无二的侏罗纪世界幕后之旅

translation.en: As well as kayaking, rock climbing, obstacle courses, and of course...
translation.zh: 以及划皮船、攀岩、障碍赛当然还有…
是的 达瑞斯 一抓一大把的恐龙

translation.en: But I'm gonna need that speech a little shorter,
translation.zh: 不过发言能不能稍微简短点？

translation.en: and really try to lean into the majesty of this place.
Let's get the six of you to camp.
translation.zh: 我们带你们六个去营地

translation.en: Uh, there are five of us.
Dino-kid, Track-Star, Internet Girl, Barfy, Texas.
translation.zh: 恐龙迷小子、田径明星、网红呕吐的家伙、德州女孩

translation.en: Greetings, my dudes. Kenji is here, so let the party commence!
translation.zh: 朋友们 大家好 健二来了派对开始吧

translation.en: [Ben] I hope you got my mom's note.
translation.zh: 希望你们收到了我妈妈的便条

translation.en: I don't do well on windy roads.
translation.zh: 我受不了蜿蜒曲折的路

translation.en: It's your girl Brooklynn coming at you from the best place ever:
translation.zh: 我是你们最喜爱的布鲁克琳在最棒的地方向你们问好

translation.en: Like and subscribe to join me as I unbox Jurassic World!
translation.zh: 点赞订阅 和我一起揭秘侏罗纪世界

translation.en: Okay, I need you all to say who you are and a little bit about yourself.
translation.zh: 好的 你们每人做个简短的自我介绍

translation.en: I beat this awesome VR dinosaur game.
translation.zh: 我打赢了精彩的虚拟现实恐龙游戏

translation.en: I just can't believe... you're Brooklynn!
translation.zh: 简直不敢相信 你就是布鲁克琳
我是森美古铁雷斯 头号琳粉

translation.en: Oh, also, my family supplies all the beef for the park, and that's how I got here.
translation.zh: 对了 公园的所有牛肉都是我家提供的 所以我来了
很高兴见到你 森美

translation.en: Oh, that's just what my online followers call themselves.
Uh, all 27 million of us. [imitates gunfire]
Yep. That's why she's the only one who gets to keep her cell phone.
translation.zh: 没错 难怪只有她能带手机
等等 一个有钱 一个有名？

translation.en: -[car door opens] -Um, Dave, what's going on?
-Nothing you need to worry about. -[electricity crackles]
But you should all definitely stay in your seats.
Oh, these things are always getting out of their enclosure.
translation.zh: 这些家伙经常跑出围栏

translation.en: It took a blanket and a cat carrier to catch it.
translation.zh: 毛毯加宠物笼就把它抓住了

translation.en: Hey, Brooklanders, check this place out!
translation.zh: 嘿 琳粉们 瞧瞧这里

translation.en: Is this not the most amazing place you have ever seen?
translation.zh: 是不是你们见过的最神奇的地方？

translation.en: If you think this is cool, you should see my dad's penthouse in the main park.
translation.zh: 你要是觉得这就叫酷的话应该瞧瞧我爸爸在主公园建的阁楼

translation.en: So, as an elite athlete, how pumped are you for camp?
translation.zh: 作为顶级运动员你下了多少功夫参加冒险营？

translation.en: Not a huge fan of being on camera.
This place is almost as big as my family's ranch back home.
translation.zh: 这里几乎和我家的牧场一样大

translation.en: That's because when we're up and running,
the camp will house 500 kids and 150 staff.
translation.zh: 营地将容纳500名儿童与150名员工

translation.en: Announcement time from your co-head counselors.
translation.zh: 联合首席辅导员有事要宣布

translation.en: Okay, everyone, there's some ground rules to cover.
translation.zh: 好的 各位 有几条基本规则要遵守

translation.en: Curfew's at 8:00 p.m., and lights out at 9:00 p.m. sharp.
translation.zh: 宵禁时间为晚上8点 9点整熄灯

translation.en: We are in a dinosaur-filled jungle.
translation.zh: 这里可是遍布恐龙的丛林

translation.en: You must always keep your distance,
translation.zh: 你们必须随时与它们保持距离

translation.en: or you could be seriously hurt, if not worse.
translation.zh: 否则可能受重伤 说不定更糟

translation.en: -First one there gets top bunk! -[Kenji grunts]
-[shrieks] -[Roxie] Get this lovely lady back to her pen.
translation.zh: 把这只可爱的小家伙送回围栏
它的家人可能急得团团转

translation.en: Oh, man, I really wanted to get a closer look at that Compy.
translation.zh: 天啊 我好想近距离看看那只美颌龙

translation.en: I like your enthusiasm, Darius, but right now it's "claiming a bunk" time.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的热情 达瑞斯但现在是找床铺时间

translation.en: So, you know... go claim a bunk.
But it's the first dinosaur I've ever seen in person
translation.zh: 可它是我亲眼见到的第一只恐龙

translation.en: and, I mean, we're here to see dinosaurs, so...
translation.zh: 我们就是来看恐龙的 所以…

translation.en: Oh, the day is not over, buddy.
translation.zh: 今天还没结束 哥们

translation.en: Wow, you really do know your stuff, dino-nerd.
translation.zh: 天啊 你知道的还真不少 恐龙迷

translation.en: They don't have those here. Common mistake.
translation.zh: 这里没有雷龙 常见的错误

translation.en: They are cooking up all kinds of new dinos in that lab.
translation.zh: 他们在实验室里培育各种新恐龙

translation.en: Whoa! Where are they herding 'em to?
translation.zh: 天啊 他们要把恐龙赶去哪里？

translation.en: They're herding them back to their nighttime enclosures.
Me? Maybe Yasmina should go first, or... Darius?
translation.zh: 我？或许应该让雅丝敏娜先来或者达瑞斯？

translation.en: Uh... Or anyone! I really don't-- [screams]
translation.zh: 谁都可以 我真的不…

translation.en: Oh, hey there, dino-nerd. Whatcha doing?
translation.zh: 嘿 恐龙迷 你在干吗？

translation.en: I was just, uh, heading out 'cause...
translation.zh: 我想出去一下 因为…

translation.en: Oh, yeah. I... I meant, um... hungry.
Oh, heh, look at that. Thanks, Kenji.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧 谢了 健二

translation.en: I don't want you to be intimidated by me just because I'm rich,
translation.zh: 别因为我有钱 你就怕我

translation.en: my father owns a few condos on the island, and I'm rich.
translation.zh: 不过是爸爸在岛上有几栋楼我还很有钱

translation.en: -Uh, I'm not intimidated by you. -Oh, good.
I just want us to be friends, and friends tell each other stuff.
translation.zh: 我只想和你交朋友 朋友无话不说

translation.en: For instance, what they're doing out of bed after curfew.
translation.zh: 比如宵禁后下床做什么

translation.en: I think you best get your arm off me... friend.
translation.zh: 我觉得你最好把手拿开 朋友

translation.en: Oh. Why don't you make me, friend?
translation.zh: 我偏不 你能把我怎么样 朋友？

translation.en: So that's what toxic masculinity looks like.
translation.zh: 看来这就是阳刚之气过剩

translation.en: Uh, sorry we woke you. I--
translation.zh: 抱歉把你吵醒了 我…

translation.en: He was sneaking out, but I set him straight.
translation.zh: 他偷溜出去 好在我纠正了他

translation.en: Look, I try to look out for the younger kids.
translation.zh: 我尽力关照年纪小的孩子

translation.en: I've been waiting my whole life to get here,
translation.zh: 我等了太久才来到这里

translation.en: and I'm gonna make the most of it.
Those lights must be coming from the Compy enclosure.
translation.zh: 那些光肯定是从美颌龙围栏传来的

translation.en: Sneaking out to see dinosaurs in the dead of night,
translation.zh: 半夜三更偷溜出去看恐龙
冒着被抓到的巨大风险

translation.en: The truck definitely headed this direction.
translation.zh: 卡车绝对是朝这个方向走的

translation.en: Of course this is it. Why else would they have--
translation.zh: 当然是了 不然他们为什么…

translation.en: You can get a good shot from over here.
translation.zh: 从这里拍 角度一级棒
-我来吧-不了 谢谢 我可以…
谢谢 健二 这下好极了

translation.en: -Wait! What are you-- -I got it, kid.
translation.zh: -等等 你做…-我搞得定 小子
瞧瞧 一点也没摔坏

translation.en: Great. Now, just climb back up and gently hand it to me.
translation.zh: 很好 爬上来 温柔地递给我

translation.en: Sure, sure, right after I get a sweet dino-pic for your followers.
translation.zh: 没问题 我先为你的粉丝拍张超棒的恐龙照片

translation.en: Quiet, junior! The grown-ups are talking.
translation.zh: 安静 小子 没看见大人在说话吗？

translation.en: Ah, your followers are gonna love this.
translation.zh: 你的粉丝肯定会喜欢的

translation.en: D'ah! Open the gate! Open the gate!
Dude! Please tell me you have a plan.
translation.zh: 哥们 你一定有计划吧？

translation.en: Let's move! The steam should keep him busy.
translation.zh: 快走 蒸汽应该能困住它
